desc: This list contains users who have violated the comment rules of E-Hentai and are deemed by the developers to be suitable for default blocking for all users. If you wish to maintain this list, refer to: https://github.com/jiangtian616/JHenTai/issues/new?assignees=&labels=&projects=&template=add_build_in_blocked_user.yml
descCN: 这个名单存储着违反E站评论规则的用户，并且被开发者认为适合被所有用户默认屏蔽。如果你想维护这个名单，参考：https://github.com/jiangtian616/JHenTai/issues/new?assignees=&labels=&projects=&template=add_build_in_blocked_user.yml
